name: Sidewalk District
overview:
Sidewalk District is a multi-channel retail marketplace for local independent retailers, leveraging e-commerce & m-commerce to give local retailers a cyber sidewalk.

The Sidewalk District platform allows consumers to discover, peruse and shop their favorite local shops from their phone, tablet or computer. We bring the inventories of local boutique, home décor, gift, pet and bicycle shops online and mobile, into one marketplace, allowing shopping at local stores to be just as easy as shopping at major retail chains.

Sidewalk District enables multi-channel retail for local independent retailers while: preserving stores’ brand integrity and identity; creating a seamless integration of vendor product information and pictures; horizontal inventory grab fostering “co-opetition”; social shopping community on a virtual sidewalk.
